name: Action Time
description:
Action Time is A time reversing one hit kill game or simply Hotline Miami with rewind. In Action time, each time player dies, they can rewind to “ANY POINT IN TIME” in the level and fix their mistake.

After finishing a level, player will see the perfect replay without the deaths and feel like the ultimate killing machine.

Slow motion

Features Rewind Time

In ACTION TIME each time YOU die; You can rewind to “ANY POINT IN TIME” in the level and fix your mistake.

Replay

After Completing level, You'll see a perfect replay, without the deaths. Makes you feel like John Wick

Dynamic Lighting

Each Shot will illuminate the room and give visual dynamic on each action

FAQ

We'll update you when its ready.

Currently the game doesn't suppport controller, but we plan to have controller support in the future.
